words.english: I will go = I will go
→ I will go to the supermarket

words.portuguese: → Meu amigo é um motorista horrível, ele não pode ficar na estrada.
words.english: → My friend is a horrible driver, he can't stay on the road.

words.portuguese: → Nós devemos quebrar em partes. (physically breaking into parts)
words.english: → We must physically break into parts.

words.portuguese: → Nós devemos separar por partes. (Breaking an idea down into parts)
words.english: → We must break it down into parts. (Breaking an idea down into parts)

words.portuguese: → Eu estava bebendo chá, agora eu bebo café. Eu mudei!
words.english: → I was drinking tea, now I drink coffee. I've changed!

words.portuguese: → Nos envie (envia = more casual) as caixas para cá.
words.english: → Send us (send = more casual) the boxes here.

words.portuguese: → Maconha é proibida em São Paulo.
words.english: → Marijuana is prohibited in São Paulo.
